data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Daniele Polotow, Rudy Jocque (2015): Afroneutria, a new spider genus of Afrotropical Ctenidae (Arachnida, Araneae). European Journal of Taxonomy 121: 1-27, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2015.121, URL: http://www.europeanjournaloftaxonomy.eu/index.php/ejt/article/view/243/0|98 occurrences
